title: Voxiversity: Thucydides S6
author: VD
content_html:
The quiz covering the events of Book Five, which took place during the tenth through sixteenth years of the war can be taken here. It looks like we’re down to a bare 30 from the original 120, so if you’ve made it this far, you should be proud of yourself. Only three books to go! Discuss freely… next week’s reading is Book Six. And yes, there will be a final exam of 25 questions.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 1.1 to 1.115.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 1.116 to 2.46.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 2.47 to 2.103.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 3.1 to 3.116.

The History of the Peloponnesian War 4.1 to 4.135.
